0.0.3.en: Replace widget preview pictures + replace driver image + Add licens comment in description

0.0.5.en: Fixing floor mapping and switching issues

0.0.6.en: Trying to fix floor finalizing by adding waittime for finalization

0.0.7.en: Fix map file handling, add no-dock segmentation trigger, fix SSH reboot path, add Roborock S5 driver

0.0.8.en: Add error alarm for Homey Insights, fix widget for multi-driver support

0.0.9.en: Always trigger segmentation after mapping if segments don't appear

0.1.0.en: Multi-driver flow card support: all flow triggers, conditions and actions are now available for both the Valetudo and Roborock S5 drivers. Mop-only actions (set water usage, operation mode, auto-empty) remain Valetudo-driver exclusive as the S5 does not support these features.
